name: Receipt of funds for study and control of hazardous waste
text: [§342J-40]  Receipt of funds for study and control of hazardous waste.  The director may cooperate with and receive money, with the approval of the governor, from the federal government, any political subdivision of the State, or from private sources for the study and control of hazardous waste. [L 1989, c 212, pt of §5]
